Giuliani: s assertion that the gun violence in Chicago is solely due to "one party Democratic rule for decades" is oversimplified and does not take into account the complex factors contributing to the issue.
Giuliani misidentified Garry McCarthy as: Jerry" in his tweets, showing a lack of attention to detail and accuracy in his statements.
The claim that Mayor Rahm Emanuel: s legacy is "more murders in his city than ever before" is misleading. While the number of homicides in 2016 was high, it was still lower than the record number of murders in 1974.
